summary: "Aren't your people worth more than your pride?"
body:
“Aren’t your people worth more than your pride?”

Two people said this. Jon and Dano.

Jon said this when he was a boy. BEFORE HE WAS BETRAYED.

“Fuck my pride.”

Let it marinate people. LET IT MARINATE.

reblog.comment:

“Fuck my pride.”

Let it marinate people. LET IT MARINATE.

Let it marinate people. LET IT MARINATE.

question: Sansa/Podrick + 28 stargazing thanks!
answer:
The air was cold.  Too cold to be outside staring up at the stars, but here she was anyway. Lady Sansa must have ice running through her veins, Podrick thought to himself as he approached her.

“My lady,” he said, dropping his head in a quick bow.

“Podrick,” she replied, a soft smile gracing her lips. “What brings you out on such a cold night.”

“Well, you… my lady,” he said, returning her smile. “I was instructed to keep you safe. And it is my definition of safe that includes ‘warm and indoors’.”

“Warm is a relative term, ser,” she said, arching a delicate brow as she turned back to the stars.

“Humor me, Lady Sansa.”

“Humor me first, Podrick. Let’s look at the stars for just a few moments more, and I’ll come with you indoors.” She reached for his hand, which warmed him immediately.

As he gazed up at the stars, he realized that Lady Sansa had more than ice running through her veins.

Want one of your own?

blog.name: perfectdisastr
blog.title: Hello, I'm overdramatic! Who are you?

summary: My reasoning for not wanting Sansa to be Danys friend, is that, considering I don't believe the Dragons will be the thing to...
body:
My reasoning for not wanting Sansa to be Danys friend, is that, considering I don’t believe the Dragons will be the thing to save the world from the White Walkers, there is just nothing Dany can give to Sansa and contribute in this friendship…

If Sansa can braid her ugly ass DNA Hair and sew her a wedding dress, she should be getting something in return.

I know it ain’t right to expect people to repay you for doing a nice thing for them, but if you’re the only person doing nice things, that is not your friend.

All Sansa gets from Dany is the D taking away the North’s independence and a new mad queen she needs to keep happy at all costs and play along with to not get fucking murdered…

I also don’t want Arya to admire Dany, because she is no longer 10 and understands that ‘having Dragons’ is not included in 'reasons you should instantly like the mentally unstable person, wanting to rule over your home, because her impeached Daddy did so and only saved your stupid brother, because the Nightking needed a Dragon’

That’s kind of because I hate Dany, but I hate Dany for legit reasons, so…

If anyone could give me legit reasons for why these friendships should not become a thing, pls tell me. I’m sad, I need it and I’m a dumbass focusing on the negative…

summary: Harrenhal - Chapter 30 - Sandor X - now up
title: Harrenhal - Chapter 30 - Sandor X - now up
body:
It’s chapter X for a reason, right? 

I know the fic’s been a bit torn about Sandor and Gregor’s relationship throughout. It’s just… I guess the only other person I remember Sandor talking about killing is Sansa. With other people, he just kills them. 

Anyway…

It’s here on AO3 if you’d like to read it.

blog.name: incorrect-got-quotes
blog.title: Dead, almost like my interest in the show
blog.description: I post quotes when I feel like it. Mostly nowadays I don’t.If you want to use one of the quotes as a story or drawing prompt, I'm fine with that, as long as you credit me in your story or art. Also, tag any drawings under #oberyn’s saucy art. Yes, I am in fact Oberyn Martell. For those on mobile, here is my ship list: https://incorrect-got-quotes.tumblr.com/list-of-ships Main: garnetislovegarnetislife. SUBMISSION BOX IS (MOST LIKELY) PERMANENTLY CLOSED!

title: THE REUNION 2.0
body:
Sweet @otp-chemistry asked my opinion on the HBO promo so, here we go.

Let me first say that Sansa opening her arms to welcome Jon really gets to me and if you add that she’s probably smiling (we can see her tense cheek) we have a confirmation that she still trusts him and probably knows what’s happening. Anyway, I’m not sure this will be the final cut, not only because very often for advertising it’s used a different one, but it also appears that there are some missing beats between the first and the second part. Maybe we will be able to see Jon’s face? Maybe they’ll both have their eyes closed for a moment? I hope so, and since there are new people to be introduced… I believe this time we will see them pull away (I like the idea that Sansa will be the first to do it because Jon does not want to).

About the hug:

they are really pressed against each other! I wonder if this is a one arm hug, because if it’s not, the only place where Jon can put his right arm (look at the last frame before the close up on Sansa) would be under her cloak. Also, I saw many gifs that hypothesize some whispered words, but if you notice how Jon’s ear is close to Sansa’s, that’s definitely too forward for his lips to “rest” on her ear. Of course these details don’t necessarily mean something, it could simply be the director’s choice for a better effect (and it’s not that easy to shoot the embrace without framing the height difference). At first then I got the impression that there was a zoom in on them but the background remains almost the same, which means that Jon is holding Sansa very tight, cradling her to himself like, “Come here, I’m never letting you go again”… One last thing: is that Brienne’s giant shoulder beside Sansa’s head? Because if she is already there, maybe she might have carried a message with her…

As for the initial part, again the background tells us something: 

probably Jon’s just arrived because behind him we can see the ramparts to the left of Winterfell’s entrance and so probably Sansa was already waiting, as also confirmed by her position (she has behind her the ramparts in front of the entrance). 

It makes sense because they’re in daylight so someone must have warned them of the party coming.

I’d like to think that maybe Jon will arrive a little before the others just to have time to properly reunite with his family but if you look to his left there is a wagon with a soldier on it that’s difficult was already there because it’s near the entrance, which is usually free from obstacles. So I think they will arrive all together, and since D&D love their parallels, maybe we’ll have a welcome like this

And to mark a difference, maybe not everyone will be present this time: Bran for exemple is a bit tactless these days (I wouldn’t be surprised if the first thing out of his mouth were “Hello Aegon”) so maybe their first meeting will be in private and he will go straight sucker punching him with the TRUTH. And as much as I’d love to see Arya running towards Jon I don’t think her new NO ONE self makes it probable, at least not in front of everyone. So I really think this will be the first hug and since it seems he kind of starts walking, with just a hint of a twirl, Sansa already quite close, I have a wishful thought: Ghost has moved from her to meet and greet Jon (and the more money we know that D&D have asked HBO to spend on more CGI would be very well spent)… But, much more simply, probably Jon has just dismounted off his horse!

To conclude, the funny part: I really can’t find the words to describe Jon aiming straight to Sansa’s lips only to change direction at the last moment preferring the safest neck… I choose not to comment!

That’s it everyone!

Thanks for listening.

blog.name: hypomone535
blog.title: Dream of Ice and Fire
blog.description:
I am a Stark of Winterfell

I am a writer of Jonsa

tags: someone help me with tumblr links
body:
Not Like the Songs - Chapter 10

Like a cold wind on her bare skin, Sansa was defenseless against the memory of that question.

“What do you want that you do not have?”

When he had ridden back into Winterfell’s gates, a black tower against the blanket of white destruction, how eagerly she had opened her arms.

“I’ve tried to be smart Sansa.” He had whispered into the crook of her neck.

“Have you?” had been her muffled reply. The joy of his homecoming tainted as her eyes had risen from behind his shoulder, and fell into the face of the Dragon Queen.

Strong emotion stirred in her belly as she thought about this man and his gentle eyes. She had practiced wearing a mask for so many years, untouched by the changes around her, and he had seen her anyway. The rhythm of their life was so sweet. The eager dynamic between her and Jon had been building slowly, reconstructing her heart and renaming her soul.

Her stomach swooped as the weight of the realization fell, heady and terrifying. She had married him out of duty, but here she sat, miles away from a home she’d vowed never to leave again. For him.

Looking back up at Gilly, Sansa remained silent. Knowing any more words she could offer would be utterly useless.

Read the whole story on AO3

http://bit.ly/2MXfxlv

summary: “Joffrey never let anyone question his authority.”- Sansa to Jon.  Guess who will not let anyone question her “I was born to...
body:
“Joffrey never let anyone question his authority.”- Sansa to Jon.

Guess who will not let anyone question her “I was born to rule the seven kingdoms” or they burn?

Sansa is going to have some fun.

summary:
Do y'all like good fic? Have you ever had an AMAZING idea for a fic but lacked the talent to write it out? 
WELL THEN GOOD NEWS...
body:
Do y'all like good fic? Have you ever had an AMAZING idea for a fic but lacked the talent to write it out?


WELL THEN GOOD NEWS FOR YOU


@captainbee89 (author of such iconic fics as I won’t let you be denied, a-z kink list, undeclosed desires, and not my sister among others) is auctioning off her 200th fic!!!!!


So start putting in your bids now because you know you want her to write that filthy smutty au you’ve had in the back of your head-or turn your favorite romcom into jonsa goodness, or really whatever she writes it all and it’s all amazing!!!

title:
Chapter 5 | Grain Belt
        |
        Minnesota, State Of...
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
“Alright. Tell me why you like him then.”

“He’s good.” The words came so quickly from her lips, Sansa didn’t have any time to think about them. But as she said them, it seemed right. It seemed true. “He’s… kind. Not at first. And not to everyone. He’s a bit rough around the edges, you know. I don’t even know if I even really like him, not yet!

“I mean, we only got coffee the once. But it was fun. He’s easy to talk to. And he’s funny. I mean, when we talk, it’s not like it is with guys my age. Like, he teases me. But not in a mean way or like he’s trying to be smarter than me and show off. Just like… in a nice way. And he is smart! He holds an actual conversation. Asks me about things. About myself. And then he actually listens to my answers.

“I don’t know. I don’t know if I really even like him, honestly. It would never work. He’s older than me. I’m just a college kid. I’m just a dumb little girl, probably. He doesn’t like me like that, I’m sure. Except he has this nickname for me, and when he says it, it’s so… I don’t even know. It’s just good.”

“Well,” Talisa ran her finger around the edge of her mug, her eyes on Sansa, “it seems to me that you do like him.”

summary: who do you think will die in got 8?
question: who do you think will die in got 8?
answer:
I’m assuming you mean game of thrones season 8. Well I have some theories. I’ll rank them in order of how certain I am that they will die:

Definitely Going To Kark It

1) Cercei - She’s on everyone’s list. I will eat my hat if she survives this season.

2) Dany - If you know me, you know I love villain!dany. I just love how left of field it would be to casuals and I feel like having us follow and love a heroine who slowly descends into evil is right up GRRM’s alley. If I am right in this, Dany will definitely die. If I’m wrong and she’s not a villain, I still feel like her chance for dying is pretty high.

3) Tyrion - This is more of a gut feeling, but I have a theory that Tyrion is going to be executed by Dany. I think this would act as a perfect moral event horizon for her, showing the audience once and for all that she has become a villain. It’s like boiling a frog, the temperature goes up so slowly that the frog doesn’t notice until it’s too late. If I’m wrong, I’m still pretty sure he’s gonna die.

4) Tormund - Listen, Tormund has been on my Will Die list since he first appeared. If he survives to the end of the show I will be very, very shocked.

5) Sandor - The Hound is too axe crazy suicidal to live tbh.

6) Most, if not all, of the misc. villains

7) Greyworm - Almost a toss up. If he weren’t a soldier.

Toss Ups

8) Varys - I’m not sure about Varys, he’s got a “he will outlive us all” vibe but he’s also got a “cat on its ninth life” vibe. I’m leaning a little more toward cat on its ninth life.

9) Bran/Arya - See the thing is, I don’t want either of them to die. However I do believe there’s a strong possibility that at least one is going to kark it. Which of them does die is such a complete toss up for me that I had to group them together. If I had to say whilst at gunpoint, I would say Arya. I feel her death would complete her story arc in the same way the Hound’s death would complete his and Cercei’s would complete hers.

10) Misc. general characters that I have not mentioned above or below

12) Davos - I can see him as dying in a last stand sort of thing. He’s already outlived most of the people he cares about, and I’m not sure about whether that makes him more or less likely to die.

13) Jaime - While him dying would make sense, I feel like he might actually live. Still a toss up.

14) Gendry - So I think if Arya dies, Gendry will as well. And if she lives, he’ll live. I see them both going off and doing something when all is said and done.

15) Brienne - Maaaaybe? I’m preeettty sure she’s gonna live.

Gonna Live (Maybe)

16) Sansa - Almost a toss up, but I feel her character arc doesn’t make sense unless she lives on with the lessons life has beaten into her.

17) Jon - Also almost a toss up, however I have a feeling that he’s gonna end up on the iron throne. Or at least ruling a large portion of westeros. Otherwise I feel like the only point of him being a secret targ is for a surprise!incest reveal with Dany. I suppose you could argue he needs royal blood if he’s gonna be the prince that was promised, but that isn’t confirmed and the starks were kings a while ago so  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

18) Theon - Now I could be wrong here, but I feel like Theon may have actually delved into Earn Your Happy Ending territory. It’s a very small area in GoT, but I think he might have just managed to mumblefuck his way in. Could be wrong.

18) Sam, Gilly & Junior - I’m pretty sure these guys are fine. In fact I’d say they’re the safest out of everyone. Just another gut feeling.

1) Cercei - She’s on everyone’s list. I will eat my hat if she survives this season.

2) Dany - If you know me, you know I love villain!dany. I just love how left of field it would be to casuals and I feel like having us follow and love a heroine who slowly descends into evil is right up GRRM’s alley. If I am right in this, Dany will definitely die. If I’m wrong and she’s not a villain, I still feel like her chance for dying is pretty high.

3) Tyrion - This is more of a gut feeling, but I have a theory that Tyrion is going to be executed by Dany. I think this would act as a perfect moral event horizon for her, showing the audience once and for all that she has become a villain. It’s like boiling a frog, the temperature goes up so slowly that the frog doesn’t notice until it’s too late. If I’m wrong, I’m still pretty sure he’s gonna die.

4) Tormund - Listen, Tormund has been on my Will Die list since he first appeared. If he survives to the end of the show I will be very, very shocked.

5) Sandor - The Hound is too axe crazy suicidal to live tbh.

6) Most, if not all, of the misc. villains

7) Greyworm - Almost a toss up. If he weren’t a soldier.

Toss Ups

8) Varys - I’m not sure about Varys, he’s got a “he will outlive us all” vibe but he’s also got a “cat on its ninth life” vibe. I’m leaning a little more toward cat on its ninth life.

9) Bran/Arya - See the thing is, I don’t want either of them to die. However I do believe there’s a strong possibility that at least one is going to kark it. Which of them does die is such a complete toss up for me that I had to group them together. If I had to say whilst at gunpoint, I would say Arya. I feel her death would complete her story arc in the same way the Hound’s death would complete his and Cercei’s would complete hers.

10) Misc. general characters that I have not mentioned above or below

12) Davos - I can see him as dying in a last stand sort of thing. He’s already outlived most of the people he cares about, and I’m not sure about whether that makes him more or less likely to die.

13) Jaime - While him dying would make sense, I feel like he might actually live. Still a toss up.

14) Gendry - So I think if Arya dies, Gendry will as well. And if she lives, he’ll live. I see them both going off and doing something when all is said and done.

15) Brienne - Maaaaybe? I’m preeettty sure she’s gonna live.

Gonna Live (Maybe)

16) Sansa - Almost a toss up, but I feel her character arc doesn’t make sense unless she lives on with the lessons life has beaten into her.

17) Jon - Also almost a toss up, however I have a feeling that he’s gonna end up on the iron throne. Or at least ruling a large portion of westeros. Otherwise I feel like the only point of him being a secret targ is for a surprise!incest reveal with Dany. I suppose you could argue he needs royal blood if he’s gonna be the prince that was promised, but that isn’t confirmed and the starks were kings a while ago so  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

18) Theon - Now I could be wrong here, but I feel like Theon may have actually delved into Earn Your Happy Ending territory. It’s a very small area in GoT, but I think he might have just managed to mumblefuck his way in. Could be wrong.

18) Sam, Gilly & Junior - I’m pretty sure these guys are fine. In fact I’d say they’re the safest out of everyone. Just another gut feeling.

Characters: Sansa Stark, Sandor Clegane, Arya Stark, Tormund Giantsbane, Brienne of Tarth, Margaery Tyrell, Bronn (ASoIaF), Gendry Waters, Khal Drogo, Daenerys Targaryen

Summary:

Sansa Stark had no idea how she wound up being friend and lover to Sandor Clegane, only that neither of them is sure how to tell their friends that they’ve been banging. Days apart, at night they’re naked.

Modern AU, filled with so much SanSan smut.

summary: Oh my god I just realized that Cell Games Gohan and Sansa Stark are the same character
body:
Oh my god I just realized that Cell Games Gohan and Sansa Stark are the same character

Both innocent kids put in unfair and dangerous positions by their fathers.

Both subjected to tons of abuse.

Both kind, non-combatant pacifists who supposedly don’t “fit” their heritage

Both forced into deadly worlds and turmoil at age 11

Both make mistakes that contribute to major family tragedies by harshly misjudging what a ruthless, manipulative person is capable of (Cell, Cersei)

Both have to witness their fathers’ deaths

Both exploited based on their heritage (Son of Son Goku the first Super Saiyan in a millennium, “Key to the North”)

Both isolated from family for long periods of time

Both have mothers with high ambitions for them

Both forced into games they never wanted to play

Both highly compassionate and surprisingly sane people despite having witnessed and undergone tons of horrors

Both highly repressed.

Holy shit.
